pullrequest.title: Model submission for X2 sensor configuration 1 from Robotika.

content.raw:
@{557058:490c665b-b69c-40f3-80ea-64f20747efc4}  it appears I've made a mistake.  The relative paths you originally had in your `robot_from_sdf.xacro` and `robot_from_sdf.urdf` were correct and working in RViz.  If you could revert to the relative paths you had previously, it would be appreciative.  I apologize for the confusion!


i.e. I made these changes to get it back working in `robot_from_sdf.xacro`
```
diff -r 59a32aa6ac6c submitted_models/robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/urdf/robot_from_sdf.urdf
--- a/submitted_models/robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/urdf/robot_from_sdf.urdf	Thu Dec 12 00:11:02 2019 +0100
+++ b/submitted_models/robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/urdf/robot_from_sdf.urdf	Wed Dec 11 23:11:49 2019 -0500
@@ -15,7 +15,7 @@
     <visual name='chassis_visual'>
       <origin xyz='0 0 -0.0655' rpy='1.5708 0 -1.5708'/>
       <geometry>
-        <mesh filename='package:meshes/x2_chassis.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
+        <mesh filename='package://robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/meshes/x2_chassis.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
       </geometry>
     </visual>
     <visual name='navsat_visual_1'>
@@ -27,25 +27,25 @@
     <visual name='center_left_headlight_visual'>
       <origin xyz='0.22 0.05 0.0845' rpy='0 0 -3.14159'/>
       <geometry>
-        <mesh filename='package:meshes/headlight.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
+        <mesh filename='package://robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/meshes/headlight.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
       </geometry>
     </visual>
     <visual name='left_headlight_visual'>
       <origin xyz='0.22 0.145 0.0845' rpy='0 0 -3.14159'/>
       <geometry>
-        <mesh filename='package:meshes/headlight.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
+        <mesh filename='package://robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/meshes/headlight.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
       </geometry>
     </visual>
     <visual name='center_right_headlight_visual'>
       <origin xyz='0.22 -0.05 0.0845' rpy='0 0 -3.14159'/>
       <geometry>
-        <mesh filename='package:meshes/headlight.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
+        <mesh filename='package://robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/meshes/headlight.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
       </geometry>
     </visual>
     <visual name='right_headlight_visual'>
       <origin xyz='0.22 -0.145 0.0845' rpy='0 0 -3.14159'/>
       <geometry>
-        <mesh filename='package:meshes/headlight.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
+        <mesh filename='package://robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/meshes/headlight.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
       </geometry>
     </visual>
     <visual name='camera_visual'>
@@ -91,7 +91,7 @@
     <visual name='visual'>
       <origin xyz='0 0 0' rpy='1.5708 -0 0'/>
       <geometry>
-        <mesh filename='package:meshes/x2_wheel_left.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
+        <mesh filename='package://robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/meshes/x2_wheel_left.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
       </geometry>
     </visual>
   </link>
@@ -110,7 +110,7 @@
     <visual name='visual'>
       <origin xyz='0 0 0' rpy='1.5708 -0 0'/>
       <geometry>
-        <mesh filename='package:meshes/x2_wheel_right.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
+        <mesh filename='package://robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/meshes/x2_wheel_right.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
```

content.html:
@Martin Dlouhy it appears I've made a mistake. The relative paths you originally had in your robot_from_sdf.xacro and robot_from_sdf.urdf were correct and working in RViz. If you could revert to the relative paths you had previously, it would be appreciative. I apologize for the confusion!

i.e. I made these changes to get it back working in robot_from_sdf.xacro

diff -r 59a32aa6ac6c submitted_models/robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/urdf/robot_from_sdf.urdf
--- a/submitted_models/robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/urdf/robot_from_sdf.urdf Thu Dec 12 00:11:02 2019 +0100
+++ b/submitted_models/robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/urdf/robot_from_sdf.urdf Wed Dec 11 23:11:49 2019 -0500
@@ -15,7 +15,7 @@
     <visual name='chassis_visual'>
       <origin xyz='0 0 -0.0655' rpy='1.5708 0 -1.5708'/>
       <geometry>
-        <mesh filename='package:meshes/x2_chassis.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
+        <mesh filename='package://robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/meshes/x2_chassis.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
       </geometry>
     </visual>
     <visual name='navsat_visual_1'>
@@ -27,25 +27,25 @@
     <visual name='center_left_headlight_visual'>
       <origin xyz='0.22 0.05 0.0845' rpy='0 0 -3.14159'/>
       <geometry>
-        <mesh filename='package:meshes/headlight.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
+        <mesh filename='package://robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/meshes/headlight.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
       </geometry>

     <visual name='left_headlight_visual'>
       <origin xyz='0.22 0.145 0.0845' rpy='0 0 -3.14159'/>
       <geometry>
-        <mesh filename='package:meshes/headlight.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
+        <mesh filename='package://robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/meshes/headlight.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
       </geometry>
     </visual>
     <visual name='center_right_headlight_visual'>
       <origin xyz='0.22 -0.05 0.0845' rpy='0 0 -3.14159'/>
       <geometry>
-        <mesh filename='package:meshes/headlight.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
+        <mesh filename='package://robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/meshes/headlight.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
       </geometry>

     <visual name='right_headlight_visual'>
       <origin xyz='0.22 -0.145 0.0845' rpy='0 0 -3.14159'/>

-        <mesh filename='package:meshes/headlight.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>

       </geometry>
     </visual>
     <visual name='camera_visual'>
@@ -91,7 +91,7 @@
     <visual name='visual'>
       <origin xyz='0 0 0' rpy='1.5708 -0 0'/>
       <geometry>
-        <mesh filename='package:meshes/x2_wheel_left.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
+        <mesh filename='package://robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/meshes/x2_wheel_left.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
       </geometry>
     </visual>
   </link>
@@ -110,7 +110,7 @@
     <visual name='visual'>
       <origin xyz='0 0 0' rpy='1.5708 -0 0'/>
       <geometry>
-        <mesh filename='package:meshes/x2_wheel_right.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>
+        <mesh filename='package://robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/meshes/x2_wheel_right.dae' scale='1 1 1'/>

       <geometry>
